Uses of Interface
metrics.ConfusionMatrix

Packages that use ConfusionMatrix 
Package Description
metrics
A package that implements simple metrics such as accuracy score, confusion matrix, F1 score, specificity score and sensitivity score.

  • Uses of ConfusionMatrix in metrics

    Classes in metrics that implement ConfusionMatrix 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  ConcreteConfusionMatrix<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
    This class implements the ConfusionMatrix interface.
    Fields in metrics declared as ConfusionMatrix 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected ConfusionMatrix<T> AbstractMultipleCategoryScore.confusionMatrix
    A confusion matrix to make the calculations with
    Constructors in metrics with parameters of type ConfusionMatrix 
    Constructor Description
    AbstractMultipleCategoryScore​(ConfusionMatrix confusionMatrix, SingleScore individualScore)
    Constructor for the AbstractMultipleCategoryScore that receives a confusionMatrix and a score to be used to calculate the metric for each class and the weighted average
    F1Score​(ConfusionMatrix<T> confusionMatrix)
    Constructor for the F1Score.
    SensitivityScore​(ConfusionMatrix<T> confusionMatrix)
    Constructor for the SensitivityScore.
    SpecificityScore​(ConfusionMatrix<T> confusionMatrix)
    Constructor for the Specificity.
